metadata.inclusion: Enter programming mode by holding down the top of the paddle for 7 seconds, the LED will blink Amber. Enter exclusion mode on Z-Wave Controller, then tap the top of the paddle one time. The LED will quickly flash green. Upon successful addition to network, the LED will turn off then blink green 3 times.
metadata.exclusion: Enter programming mode by holding down the top of the paddle for 7 seconds, the LED will blink Amber. Enter exclusion mode on Z-Wave Controller, then tap the top of the paddle one time. The LED will quickly flash green. Upon successful removal from network, the Z-Wave controller will confirm
metadata.reset: Hold the top of the paddle down for 14 seconds. Upon successful reset, the LED with blink red/amber.
